idea-plugin.name: Meowsic Player
idea-plugin.description:
Integrate music player and visualizer to your IDE based on "cava" and "playerctl"

Based on "cava" and "playerctl"

Features

  • Track players and display the top first listed
  • Visualize audio
  • Control current player (play, pause, next, previous)

How to use

The player daemon is using "playerctl" which is only available on Linux-based OS.

  • Install cava
  • Install playerctl
  • Open the player at the bottom toolbar and visualize and control music played on your system
